programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: An easy job turns into a struggle for survival for a HVAC repair man; stuck to the roof, he must escape before night falls and the real horror begins.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: A desperate man plans to break into his wealthy employer's house, then learns that another thief has beaten him to it and rigged the place with deadly traps.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.sub-title: Do Not Resuscitate; We Wanted Children
programme.desc: Paramedics answer a distress call, from which they may never return; after a crisis, Ginny grows concerned with her husbands disturbing behavior.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: Streaming exclusively from Bloody Disgusting and Scotchworthy Productions, Bloody Bites compiles snack-sized horror films that will terrorize, astonish, disturb, and excite genre fans across the globe; featuring "Bite Size" and "Witchy".

programme.title: Frankenstein's Army
programme.desc: A squad of Russian soldiers must go to a remote East German village to locate missing comrades in the waning days of Word War II. Unearthing a plot to resurrect fallen soldiers, the squad becomes the target of cobbled-together monsters.

programme.title: Ringu
programme.desc: A TV reporter (Nanako Matsushima) investigates a myth that claims death will follow a strange, ordered sequence of events.

programme.title: Nightbreed: Director's Cut
programme.desc: A young man's quest to end his nightmares leads him to a cemetery where monsters have retreated to escape mankind.

programme.title: Ringu 0
programme.desc: A journalist tracks a young woman who uses her supernatural powers to kill members of an acting troupe.

programme.title: Broadcast Signal Intrusion
programme.desc: In the late 1990s, a video archivist unearths a series of sinister pirate broadcasts and becomes obsessed with uncovering the conspiracy behind them.
